snippet.title: Project 13 | Horror Game Awards February Showcase Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Welcome to Project 13, a unique Walking Simulator that challenges your perception and instincts in an repeating Psych Ward Corridor. In this immersive experience, you step into the shoes of a disposable Probant, devoid of rights and a future, tasked with navigating a mysterious, repeating Psych Ward Corridor.

Your objective is clear: report any anomalies encountered during your walks. The catch? A single mistake means starting anew. Only by consistently reporting accurately can you progress through the enigmatic corridors.

LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2758290/PROJECT_13/
---
The Horror Game Awards started towards the end of 2022 as a Horror Game of the Year Award set up by two die hard horror game fans. Fourteen content creators made up that year’s jury. It was such a success that in 2023 the jury doubled in size and the awards expanded their scope.

The aim of the awards is simple: to celebrate horror as one of the best genres in video games and to recognise the year’s greatest horror games alongside the developers who make them.

Website: https://thehorrorgameawards.com/
Merch: https://store.thehorrorgameawards.com/

Discord: https://discord.gg/j8wUUzJQ8D
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HorrorGameAward
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thehorrorgameawards
